participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and caring, always striving for the best in life.
participant_1.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and reflective, appreciating life's simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i do not have a smartphone. i can sew my own clothes. i'm retired and living the great life. i had cancer but its gone now.

content.text: I'm retired and living my great life
